constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 39 (Thursday, March 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TITUS:
H.R. 6937.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Clause 1 of
Section 8 of Article I of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1303]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the information reporting threshold for slot winnings.
